definition[0]: a big company, or a group of companies acting together as a single organization
note[0]: corporation tax (=tax that companies have to pay on their profits)
example[0]: He works for a large American corporation.
definition[1]: an organization or group of organizations that work together for a particular purpose and are officially recognized as one
example[3]: the New Orleans Citywide Development Corporation
definition[2]: a group of people elected to govern a town or city
definition[3]: a large company or group of companies acting together as a single organization
example[6]: Mesa has completed its conversion from a partnership to a corporation.
definition[4]: in Britain, a large company or a public organization
example[8]: the Corporation of the City of London
